Per-Area Customization:

You can customize the style for a specific area and use objects binding to change the style on the fly:

Customization

Highlight On Hover

Directive Usage:

Add the attribute maphilight-custom-style to your area tag, and give it a variable in the scope.

You can later manipulate that variable and the area will update instantly.

<area maphilight-custom-style="edmundBurkeCustomStyle">
